body_html: Adding the line cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include" works, but not cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda/include". I checked that on my laptop, /usr/local/cuda is symlinked to /usr/local/cuda-8.0.
body_text: Adding the line cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include" works, but not cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda/include". I checked that on my laptop, /usr/local/cuda is symlinked to /usr/local/cuda-8.0.
body: Adding the line `cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include"` works, but not `cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda/include"`. I checked that on my laptop, `/usr/local/cuda` is symlinked to `/usr/local/cuda-8.0`.
